divs: sighting detailsi just got off work and was driving down the road. i came up to a 4 way stop and seen this rise up from behind the trees. the reason i didn't get the video before i seen this cause i was in shock. i didn't know what it was i was just mesmerized by it. then it dawned on me to grab my cell phone (lg env) and record the object. the sound at the end of the video was a car that was passing me cause i stopped in the middle of the road and got out of my car. this took place around 11:25pm and 11:28pm est. i was in saginaw michigan and i was coming from deplhi stearing gear where i work. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=ghh1vdoa8l4
Summary: looked like an orange orb. Bright orange glow to it
